about_the_game:
Eight new music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test.

The following are the new tracks specially composed for the game:
■ "THE EPIC (Breakthrough)"
■ "THE WORLD BORN AGAIN (Final Showdown)"
■ "LIKE A DANCER"(Charge)"
■ "SYNC CHORDS (Battlefield Bonds)"
■ "THE SWORD OF A FLOWER (Occupation)"
■ "COURAGEOUS ADVANCE (Advancing)"
■ "RUN WITH JAGUAR (Clash)"
■ "KEEPER OF THE WALLS (Defending)"

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
detailed_description:
Eight new music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test.

The following are the new tracks specially composed for the game:
■ "THE EPIC (Breakthrough)"
■ "THE WORLD BORN AGAIN (Final Showdown)"
■ "LIKE A DANCER"(Charge)"
■ "SYNC CHORDS (Battlefield Bonds)"
■ "THE SWORD OF A FLOWER (Occupation)"
■ "COURAGEOUS ADVANCE (Advancing)"
■ "RUN WITH JAGUAR (Clash)"
■ "KEEPER OF THE WALLS (Defending)"

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

name: DW8E: BGM Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core2 DUO 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core i7 860 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over　※No 4K compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
